channel.title: Couldn't find connection vertex! Dropping packet. Help please
channel.description:
Hi, please help for me. When others people join to my serwer after few minutes in my *Bat runserwer file I see this:
[client-1-Username]: Fatal: Couldn't find connection vertex! Dropping packet. Could not save for username ClientHandler: Client username disconnected.
Please help, thanks for all.

item.title: Couldn't find connection vertex! Dropping packet. Help please
item.dc:creator: @hakam123 hakam123.
item.description:
@hakam123 wrote:

he mean in run server source

Read full topic
